getAccount(String) - Method in class bertelsbank.rest.RestResource
Returns an account object with all its transactions if the number provided by the client belongs to an existing account.
getAccountBalance(String) - Method in class bertelsbank.dataAccess.TransactionDataAccess
Provides the current balance of a specific account.

Provides the balance for a specific account.
getAccountByNumber(String, boolean) - Method in class bertelsbank.dataAccess.AccountDataAccess
Returns an account object belonging to the given number.
getAccounts() - Method in class bertelsbank.dataAccess.AccountDataAccess
Every account existing on the account database table is put into a list.
getAllAccounts() - Method in class bertelsbank.rest.RestResource
Provides a collection of all accounts which belongs to the Bertelsbank.
getAllTransactions() - Method in class bertelsbank.rest.RestResource
Provides all transactions executed within the Bertelsbank.

Provides the number of entries in a database table.
getFreeNumber() - Method in class bertelsbank.dataAccess.AccountDataAccess
The next free number for an account is determined, reserved and returned.
getFreeNumber() - Method in class bertelsbank.rest.RestResource
When a new account is to be created this method provides a free number which can be used as the account number.
